segments.text: I'm watching the two children, and their scheme is quite brazen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically defying gravity on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He clearly knows what he's doing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the joy on his face as he grabs those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is equally complicit, hands ready for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me a bit angry that they are so careless with their safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is going to tip, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are making a dangerous mess just for a few cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they are being incredibly disrespectful to their mother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their actions could lead to a serious accident, not just a snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised they haven't been caught yet; they're not exactly quiet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of mischief is really quite something to behold.
segments.speaker: PAR
